name: Into the Mosswood
description:
Into the Mosswood is a very short micro-game that will take ~15 minutes from beginning to end. It's a fairy tale.

WASD or arrows to move, F to interact.

The sound track is now on Soundcloud. Check it out: https://soundcloud.com/a-person-of-note/sets/into-the-mosswood

4-19-17 Update:

-By popular demand, the pig has been uncensored. (The pig now oinks, and, more importantly, doesn't crash the game if you try to speak to it.)

-Witch's dialogue is slower.

-Misc small bug fixes
